item.title: Thoma Bravo 将收购 Olo，餐饮技术公司估值 20 亿美元
item.description: 餐饮软件供应商 Olo 周四表示，该公司将被投资公司 Thoma Bravo 全现金收购，交易估值约为 20 亿美元。【原文：Restaurant software provider Olo said on Thursday it would be acquired by investment firm Thoma Bravo in an all-cash deal valuing the company at about $2 billion.】

item.title: 即时观点美国 6 月就业增长超出预期
item.description: 美国 6 月份就业增长高于预期，失业率下降，表明劳动力市场稳定。【原文：U.S. job growth in June rose above expectations, while the unemployment rate fell, suggesting the labor market is stable.】

item.title: 法国金融科技公司 Qonto 申请银行牌照，目标是到 2030 年拥有 200 万客户
item.description: 法国金融科技公司 Qonto 周四表示，该公司已向法国银行业监管机构申请银行执照，力图将业务拓展到支付服务之外，提供贷款、储蓄和投资产品。【原文：French fintech Qonto has applied for a banking license with France's banking regulator as it seeks to expand beyond payment services to offer lending, savings and investment products, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国每周新申请失业救济人数降至六周低点
item.description: 上周，新申请失业救济金的美国人数降至六周来的最低点，但在最初一周后继续领取救济金的人数在前一周保持稳定，创下近四年来的最高点。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for jobless benefits fell to a six-week low last week, but the ranks of those continuing to collect benefits after their initial week held steady at the highest in nearly four years in the prior week.】

item.title: 芯片设计商 Ambiq 申请在美国上市
item.description: 半导体设计公司 Ambiq 周四提交了在美国首次公开募股的申请。【原文：Semiconductor designer Ambiq on Thursday filed for an initial public offering in the United States.】

item.title: 就业报告公布后，交易员减少对美联储降息的押注
item.description: 交易员周四押注，就业市场依然强劲将使美联储在 9 月份之前不会降息，全年降息幅度也不会超过两个季度点。【原文：A still-strong job market will keep the Federal Reserve from cutting interest rates until September, and from delivering more than two quarter-point rate cuts all year, traders bet on Thursday】

item.title: 激进投资者 Starboard Value 披露持有 Tripadvisor 9% 的股份
item.description: 根据周四提交给美国证券交易委员会的一份文件，激进投资者 Starboard Value 披露持有在线旅游公司 Tripadvisor 9% 的股份。【原文：Activist investor Starboard Value disclosed a 9% stake in online travel firm Tripadvisor , according to a filing submitted to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Thursday.】

item.title: 欧盟表示，帮助企业遵守人工智能规则的实践准则或将于 2025 年底出台
item.description: 欧盟委员会周四表示，一份旨在帮助数千家公司遵守欧盟具有里程碑意义的人工智能规则的实践准则可能要到2025年底才能发布，这可能意味着要推迟6个多月。【原文：A code of practice designed to help thousands of companies comply with the European Union's landmark artificial intelligence rules may only be issued at the end of 2025, the European Commission said on Thursday, potentially marking a delay of more than six months.】

item.title: Amundi 警告称，美国的稳定币政策可能会破坏全球支付系统的稳定
item.description: 欧洲最大的资产管理公司担心，在美国《GENIUS 法案》颁布后，美元支持的稳定币的繁荣可能会导致资金流的重大转变，从而破坏全球支付系统的稳定。【原文：Europe's largest asset manager has raised concerns that a boom in dollar-backed stablecoins in the wake of the United States' GENIUS Act could cause a major shift in money flows that destabilises the global payment system.】

item.title: 摩根大通任命内部人士大卫-弗雷姆为私人银行全球首席执行官
item.description: 美国银行业巨头摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase）周四任命内部人士大卫-弗雷姆（David Frame）为其私人银行全球首席执行官，立即生效。【原文：U.S. banking giant JPMorgan Chase on Thursday named insider David Frame as the global CEO of its private bank, effective immediately.】

item.title: 美国众议院共和党人即将就特朗普的全面减税法案进行最后投票
item.description: 民主党人团结一致反对该法案，但他们本身缺乏阻止议院通过该法案的票数，而特朗普的共和党人以220:212的票数控制着议院。要使最终法案获得通过，共和党人只能承受不超过三票的倒戈。【原文：Democrats are united in opposition to the bill but on their own lack the votes to stop the bill in the chamber, which is controlled 220-212 by Trump's Republicans. Republicans can afford no more than three defections to get a final bill passed.】

item.title: 据 Moneycontrol 报道，凯雷将出售 Piramal Pharma 最多 10%的股份
item.description: 据在线新闻门户 Moneycontrol 周四援引消息人士的话报道，私募股权公司凯雷集团正准备出售印度皮拉马尔制药公司最多 10% 的股份。【原文：Private equity firm Carlyle Group is preparing to offload up to a 10% stake in India's Piramal Pharma , online news portal Moneycontrol reported on Thursday, citing sources.】

item.title: 巴西技术服务公司 C&M 在遭受网络攻击后恢复运营
item.description: 巴西技术服务供应商 C&M 软件公司周四表示，在前一天报告其系统遭到网络攻击后，经央行批准已恢复运营。【原文：Brazilian technology services provider C&M Software has resumed operations with clearance from the central bank, it said on Thursday, after reporting a cyberattack on its systems the previous day.】

item.title: 消息人士称，拉扎德聘请美银美林银行家加强金融保荐部门
item.description: 一位熟悉此举的人士周四表示，投资银行拉扎德（Lazard）已聘请美国银行的比尔-哈特（Bill Hart）领导其金融赞助商部门，主要负责西海岸客户的业务。【原文：Investment bank Lazard has hired Bank of America's Bill Hart to lead their financial sponsors division's coverage focused on West Coast clients, a person familiar with the move said on Thursday.】

item.title: AlixPartners 称，到 2030 年，中国将仅有 15 个电动汽车品牌存活下来
item.description: 咨询公司 AlixPartners 周四表示，由于激烈的竞争迫使企业进行整合，部分企业退出市场，到 2030 年，目前在中国销售电动汽车和插电式混合动力汽车的 129 个品牌中，只有 15 个在财务上是可行的。【原文：Only 15 out of the 129 brands that currently sell electric vehicles and plug-in hybrids in China will be financially viable by 2030, as intense competition forces consolidation and some to exit the market, consultancy AlixPartners said on Thursday.】

item.title: 早间投标债券守夜人暂时休息
item.description: 欧洲、中东和非洲市场即时新闻编辑 Amanda Cooper 今日美国和全球市场大事。【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today by EMEA markets breaking news editor Amanda Cooper.】

item.title: 特斯拉 6 月德国汽车销量继续下滑
item.description: 德国道路交通机构 KBA 周二表示，尽管电池电动汽车的销量总体上有所增长，但特斯拉 6 月份在德国的销量下降了 60%。【原文：Tesla's sales volume in Germany fell by 60% in June, the German road traffic agency KBA said on Tuesday, although sales of battery electric vehicles rose overall.】

item.title: 法国对 Shein 公司的欺骗性商业行为罚款 4000 万欧元
item.description: 法国反垄断机构周四表示，经过近一年的调查，该机构已对快速时尚零售商Shein处以4000万欧元（4717万美元）的罚款，原因是其涉嫌欺骗性商业行为，包括误导性折扣和对环境影响的含糊说法。【原文：France's antitrust agency said on Thursday it had fined fast-fashion retailer Shein 40 million euros ($47.17 million) for alleged deceptive business practices including misleading discounts and vague claims about environmental impact, following a nearly year-long probe.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴希望通过可交换债券融资 15.3 亿美元，推动云计算和电子商务发展
item.description: 中国科技巨头阿里巴巴集团周四表示，该公司正寻求通过可交换债券融资约120亿港元（15.3亿美元），以促进对云基础设施和全球商务运营的投资。【原文：Chinese tech giant Alibaba Group said on Thursday it is seeking to raise around HK$12 billion ($1.53 billion) through exchangeable bonds to boost investments in cloud infrastructure and global commerce operations.】

item.title: 投资者等待薪资数据，美国股指期货持稳
item.description: 美国股指期货周四持稳，投资者在等待月度就业报告，以了解劳动力市场的健康状况和美联储的货币宽松计划。【原文：U.S. stock index futures held steady on Thursday as investors awaited the monthly jobs report for insights on the health of the labor market and the Federal Reserve's plans for monetary easing.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，贝莱德考虑出售沙特阿美天然气管道股份
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道，资产管理公司贝莱德（BlackRock Inc）正在与沙特阿美公司（Saudi Aramco）谈判，希望将其所持的天然气管道网络租赁权股份剥离回沙特阿美公司。【原文：Asset manager BlackRock Inc is in talks with Saudi Aramco to divest its stake in the leasing rights of a natural gas pipeline network back to the state oil major, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 乳制品供应管理可能影响加美贸易谈判
item.description: 加拿大本周取消了对美国科技公司征收的数字服务税，以维护与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易谈判，但农业领域的另一个刺激因素可能会成为正在进行的谈判中的一根更大的刺。【原文：Canada canceled a digital service tax on U.S. technology companies this week in order to preserve trade talks with U.S. President Donald Trump, but another irritant, in agriculture, could be a bigger thorn in the ongoing negotiations.】

item.title: 美国取消对华出口限制，芯片设计软件公司业绩上升
item.description: 在美国取消对华芯片设计软件出口限制后，Synopsys 和 Cadence Design Systems 的股票在周四的盘前交易中大涨，这表明世界前两大经济体之间的贸易紧张局势已经解冻。【原文：Shares of Synopsys and Cadence Design Systems surged in premarket trade on Thursday after the United States lifted export restrictions on chip design software to China, signaling a thaw in trade tensions between the world's top two economies.】

item.title: 新日铁将为美国钢铁交易筹集 56 亿美元次级贷款
item.description: 日本新日铁公司周三表示，将通过两笔次级贷款融资 8000 亿日元（56 亿美元），为其最近斥资 149 亿美元收购美国钢铁公司提供部分资金，并为之前的贷款再融资。【原文：Japan's Nippon Steel said on Wednesday it would raise 800 billion yen ($5.6 billion) through two subordinated loans to partially fund its recent $14.9 billion acquisition of U.S. Steel and refinance previous loans.】

item.title: 解说：欧盟会推迟执行《人工智能法》吗？
item.description: 距离欧盟《人工智能法》部分条款生效还有不到一个月的时间，企业呼吁暂停实施这些条款，并得到了一些政界人士的支持。【原文：With less than a month to go before parts of the European Union's AI Act come into force, companies are calling for a pause in the provisions and getting support from some politicians.】

item.title: 印尼部长表示，印尼将在关税谈判截止日期前与美国合作伙伴签署价值 340 亿美元的协议
item.description: 印尼首席经济部长周四表示，印尼将于下周与商业伙伴签署一项价值 340 亿美元的协议，以促进从美国的采购，这是在 7 月 9 日最后期限之前与华盛顿达成贸易协议的努力的一部分。【原文：Indonesia will sign a pact worth $34 billion with business partners next week to boost purchases from the United States, as part of efforts to strike a trade deal with Washington ahead of the July 9 deadline, Indonesia's chief economic minister said on Thursday.】

item.title: 欧元区 6 月份服务业采购经理人指数显示服务业恢复温和增长
item.description: 周四的一项调查显示，欧元区占主导地位的服务业在经历了 5 月份的短暂萎缩后，于 6 月份恢复了增长，尽管商业信心有所改善，但由于需求依然疲软，增长速度仍然微弱。【原文：Growth in the euro zone's dominant services industry resumed in June after a brief contraction in May, though the pace remained marginal as demand remained weak despite improving business confidence, a survey showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 电动汽车制造商 Polestar 将在欧洲生产新车型
item.description: 总部位于瑞典的电动汽车制造商 Polestar 周四表示，其即将推出的 SUV 车型 Polestar 7 将在沃尔沃汽车位于斯洛伐克的在建工厂生产，这将是该公司首款在欧洲生产的汽车。【原文：Sweden-based electric vehicle maker Polestar said on Thursday its upcoming SUV model Polestar 7 will be manufactured at Volvo Cars' under-construction factory in Slovakia, making it its first car to be made in Europe.】

item.title: 美国众议院共和党人推进特朗普减税法案，为辩论开辟道路
item.description: 共和党控制的美国众议院周四推进了唐纳德-特朗普总统的全面减税和支出法案，这一程序性步骤为该法案可能在当天晚些时候的投票中获得通过创造了条件。【原文：The Republican-controlled U.S. House of Representatives on Thursday advanced President Donald Trump's sweeping tax-cut and spending bill, a procedural step setting the stage for possible passage of the legislation in a vote expected later in the day.】

item.title: 美国法院官员建议达利纳以 73.8 亿美元收购 Citgo 母公司
item.description: Gold Reserve 在周四的一份声明中说，负责监督委内瑞拉拥有的美国炼油商 Citgo Petroleum 母公司 PDV Holdings 拍卖的一名法院官员推荐 Gold Reserve 的子公司 Dalinar Energy 以 73.8 亿美元的价格竞拍。【原文：A court officer overseeing the auction for PDV Holdings, the parent of Venezuela-owned U.S. refiner Citgo Petroleum, has recommended Gold Reserve's subsidiary Dalinar Energy's $7.38 billion bid, Gold Reserve said in a statement on Thursday.】
